question_text: Which TWO steps can help resolve excessive multipath interference in a warehouse with metal shelving?
answer_options: Change access point to a higher frequency band
Relocate access point to a central open area
Disable DHCP on the access point
correct_answer: Change access point to a higher frequency band
Relocate access point to a central open area
explanation: Higher frequencies and better placement help mitigate signal reflections common in metal-rich environments.
